name: Uma in the Dark
description:
Play as Uma, a little creature who wants to escape the cave where she belongs a prisoner. Careful it's dark, you'll need to follow your friend, Eve.

Made for ISART Digital Game Week 2018, the theme was : "By my calculations, it should be ok!"

This game was made in less than 3 days, and contains only one level.

- Credits -

Game Designer : Valentin SERRI

Game Programmer : Bastien MAZUC

Game Artists : Juliette BOUGEARD / Antoine LHOMME / Alysson  LORENTE / Raphaelle MANIERE

Music & Sound Designer : Emilien PICHON
